options.name: Apprentice Glyphwright
options.description: You have learned the fundamentals of magical writing and runic inscription. Gain +1 skill with glyphcraft.

options.name: Subtle Inscriptions
options.description: You excel at creating hidden and protective runes which demand complete focus. Gain +1 concentration. Your runes are much harder to detect and can be made invisible to normal sight, requiring magical detection to find.

options.name: Volatile Runes
options.description: You specialize in leveraging magical forces to create explosive and destructive glyphs. Gain +1 skill with magic. Runes you create that deal damage have their damage increased by +2 and their radius increased by 1 unit.

options.name: Reaction : Quick Command
options.description: In response to any situation where you could normally use an action to activate a rune with a command word, you can instead activate it as a reaction.

options.name: Arcane Infusion
options.description: You are able to infuse your runes with raw magic. Gain +1 skill with primal magic. When you create a rune that deals aether damage, you can instead change the damage type to either lightning, heat or cold.

options.name: Shared Words
options.description: Your runes can be triggered by others who know the command word, and you can teach them these words. Unlock a magical language of your choice and gain +1 language point in it. Your runes can be activated by anyone within a short (10 unit) radius who speaks the command word.

options.name: Skilled Glyphwright
options.description: Your glyphcraft skills have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with glyphcraft. When making glyphcraft checks, any roll under a 4 becomes a 3.

options.name: Extended Duration
options.description: Your mastery allows for long-lasting magical inscriptions. When activated, your runes last an entire day instead of their normal duration.

options.name: Permanent Inscription
options.description: You can create runes that don't fade after use. Your runes don't disappear when activated and can be used once per day.

options.name: Legendary Glyphwright
options.description: You have achieved mastery over magical writing and runic arts. Gain +1 talent and +1 skill with glyphcraft. When making glyphcraft checks, any roll under a 6 becomes a 5.
